caption: Table 1: Minimax rate of convergence under label differential privacy. d is the dimension of features.
description: This table shows the minimax rates of convergence for classification and regression problems under different label differential privacy settings.  It compares the convergence rates under local and central label DP models, considering both bounded and unbounded label noise. The table also includes the non-private baseline rates for comparison, showing the impact of label DP on sample complexity and convergence rate. The parameters β and γ represent smoothness and margin conditions, respectively.
